title: It goes without saying….right!
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Happy Birthday! Kanan-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>T-, thanks, Kotori-chan…. So…. what’s that frilly fluffy thing in your hand?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu~. It’s clothes I want you to wear for the birthday party ♪ I heard about it from Chika-chan, so I made it with all my might!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Chika~.... Kotori-chan, excluding idol costumes, I normally don’t wear clothing that cute…<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Wah! Hearing that makes me look forward to it even more!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I made it so that it absolutely fits Kanan-san. So, please wear it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>If Kotori-chan is willing to say that much…. Alright! I’ll trust Kotori-chan!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
